title: Tinh Tam - Minh mang
description: This restaurant run by a Buddhist orphanage (from the nearby Duc Son Pagoda). Waiters and waitresses are all orphans. Large restaurant, no number in the address. Directions: from Hue, go down Minh Mang street until Minh Mang splits (near the entrance of the alley leading to Hong An Pagoda) - continue straight, it is not far on the right handside.
